label: 為替
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 3:  Medieval Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1990
説明文: Bills of exchange that began to be used in the mid-thirteenth century that enabled the bearer to receive a specified amount of cash; known variously as saifu and warifu.　[割符（さいふ、わりふ）]　[also read かわせ]
